name: BOSU Ball Exercises
description: Training stability and balance using BOSU ball drills.

cards.title: BOSU Squats & Lower Body Stability
cards.description: Strengthening lower body stability and proprioception using the BOSU ball.
bulletpoints: Perform squats on a BOSU ball to challenge balance
Engage core muscles to maintain upright posture
Increase difficulty by adding weights or performing single-leg squats
cards.summaryText: Sink controlled squats on the BOSU, firing core and stabilizers to stay upright on the wobble.

cards.title: BOSU Planks & Core Activation
cards.description: Using the BOSU ball to enhance core stability and upper body balance.
bulletpoints: Hold plank position on an inverted BOSU ball
Engage deep core muscles for postural stability
Progress by adding movement such as leg lifts or shoulder taps
cards.summaryText: Grip the inverted BOSU in plank, bracing core and shoulders while layering dynamic taps or lifts.
